评论概述: Looks NOTHING like the photo, Opposite Day!!!!
评论详情: I purchased a medium, I am 5’7” and 150 so medium is what I should get. It goes right below my knee. Eeewww. It’s eyelet….nowhere does it say this. Looks like it is sewn from a bed dust ruffle. I stood next to my bed and guess what??? We match!!!!
My teen needed a Rapunzel outfit for a Disney-themed party. This skirt, paired with a corset-blouse was perfect. The fabric is soft and voluminous to give it a great twirl!

I absolutely love this skirt! I originally got it in a size M, but the length was too long for me, so I swapped it for a size S. The difference is just in the length. I’m about 5’1”, and the S is perfect. The material is super soft, and when I wear it, it’s such a cute look! I ended up getting it in three different colors. Definitely recommend!

Horribly cut, pieced even worse, and wears terribly. The outer skirt is all sorts of uneven but mostly falls correct. The underskirt is atrocious-- much narrower, shorter, and more uneven than the outer skirt which causes it to bunch up awkwardly under the outer skirt. Both layers are thinner than gauze alone so removing the underskirt is not a viable option. Unwearable from the start despite the size being fine.
I love how you can layer these skirts and not look bulky. Size is accurate, stretchy and machine wash friendly! Very soft fabric and no bleeding! I got one in white and tan too!

It's polyester, not cotton. It came with a large discolored patch, and fraying at the hemline. I will be sending it back. Wish it was as advertised, because it's soft and floaty, the waistband is just right on me, and the length hits at my ankle bones. I'm 135lb and 5'4 with long legs
I bought this for Ren Faire and I love it. I’m 5’10” and these hit my feet. It is flowy with multiple layers. Highly recommend.
I really like it but........ what is it with the clothes we buy from amazon like the qrinkles dont come out you can iron steam until you pass go 5 x but i do like it.
Right size and color is exactly what I wanted.

I ordered this skirt in size small. I am 5'5 120 pounds and the small fit pretty good. It's a little thin but I do not mind. It looks good however you want to wear it. It came wrinkled but I like it that way so I did not iron  it. Very pleased.
Beautiful and breathable.
Love this skirt but it is see through so no colored underwear!
If you have hips or a thicker figure then you may want to size up. I wasn’t sure what size to get so I got a medium but a large would fit more comfortable
Sadly my skirt arrived and  it was defective. I will not be returning it due to living way out in the country so I’m just gonna repair it myself.
These are crepey thin and not in a good way. I am usually an xs/s and the small was too big on my waist which is 26”
This skirt fit perfectly and was such a nice material. I'm short so it was the perfect floor length.
Great for the renaissance festival! Wish it was a tad longer. Probably would buy the next size up next time. But otherwise, seems to be high quality and fits well!
Fun and comfy to wear!! Love it
Me gustó, es muy buen material igual que la foto
Great for summer heat.Dress up or casual.Wash in machine and drip dry.I got multiple colors
My partner loved this, it came pretty true to the size and it’s held up great for a while now. It also has underneath layers in order to keep it from being see through which they really enjoy.
A beautiful and lightweight skirt. Great quality and such a pretty color. Fits well and is so comfortable. Great price for such good quality. Great for summer.

评论概述: Way too short. Not full length.
评论详情: Amazon claimed my best sizing would be 11-12 year. I thought “okay sure” after I checked the size chart. Unfortunately I found the size chart difficult, so this may be somewhat my fault in not fitting me. However, it’s also not going to fit a child. It has a pretty small waist band that doesn’t stretch well. It also comes up to my knees. I’m only 5’5. I expected a full length skirt, the ruler in the photo is 18 inches. So I wouldn’t expect this to be a full length skirt on anyone over the age of 8.
Great value. NO POCKETS! I had to cut about 6 inches off of it.
Lovely color, lightweight, runs a little small but still ok, perfect for Faire season !
I’m 5’4”, I can see if the skirt was around two inches over length, not five-six inches!!!!

I am 5'2" and was hesitant because maxi skirts are sometimes too long for me to wear without tripping all over myself. Thankfully the elastic band on these lets me pull it up extra high and layer it as either a skirt or dress! In bottoms I usually wear a 14-16 (depending on the brand) and ordered a large and it was true to size. I have had this skirt for two summers now and it has held up and saved me over super hot days. It's super breathable and light and the color (a nice light green) was accurate to the one shown online.

评论概述: Color is great, material is hot and it's see-through
评论详情: I thought because it had 2 layers of fabric that it wouldn't be see through, but no such luck. The material also like traps heat (it doesn't look like it would from pics) so it would be good if you lived in a cold climate but I live in a state where it is hot 8 months out of the year. I feel like the length is accurate to the picture for girls who are like 5'6" but I'm tall so I'm not happy with the length. I appreciate that the color is very accurate though.
Advertised as 100% cotton.  Its 100% polyester....no thank you.  Maybe no big deal to a lot of people but if I am buying cotton I want COTTON
So cute

These are my all-time favorite skirts. You can dress them as a Boho style or a T-shirt. They are so super well-made. I actually found these on Temu first and wanted more colors so I got on Amazon and I found them and I ordered four different colors. that is how much I love these skirts. They feel fantastic. The colors are beautiful. The quality of how they’re made is great, the value of money I would say that Temu is a lot cheaper so they need to try to hit their price point if they want people to continue to buy this skirt and the best thing of all is they have pockets I love any dresses or pants that have pockets I give these skirts a 10 out of 10 since I have four from Amazon and Three from Temu and they are made exactly the same. I should add there are no little strings hanging off anywhere. They are just very good quality.
Fabric was breathable, good and thick enough so even wet, it is not see through. Color fast, fits true to size. Great value for the price.
So light and playful, fits well, goes with many outfits, may need more colors

评论概述: Exactly as it says in description
评论详情: I am 5'9" 155 and the large fits perfectly. It lands at my ankles, which is surprising dut to my height. I bought the bright green on and it didn't bleed in the wash, which also surprised me. It is actually cotton, the waistband is stretchy and it is moderately voluminous. It is so much fun! I pair it with a little t shirt and tennis shoes or flats. It's better than I thought it would be for the price. If you want a fun, cotton, comfortable skirt that transitions to the fall with boots, don't hesitate to buy it.
Such a lovely soft and flowy fabric, similar to a cotton voile. It is a very full skirt and it’s quite long so I’ll need to have it hemmed. I’m 5’3”.

I was looking for a floor length skirt. Being 5' 9"; verging on 5'10", it is very difficult to find a lot of things that don't stop at the ankle or higher. If you face the same issues, look no further. This is your skirt. The material is breathable, lightweight, and flowy. The only con is the inner slip fits a little weird, but it's because it's the same material as the skirt so it "catches" a bit. But I truly do not mind. It plays no part in the actual comfort of the skirt. I love it so much that I will be buying more. This skirt makes me feel comfortable in my skin, as with many women, I have a love/hate relationship with my body. I do not feel self-conscious in this skirt. I feel beautiful.

*keep in mind in the first two photos I’m also wearing a white underskirt* It’s gorgeous. And it’s gonna look even better ironed. I’m very happy with the skirt. I’m 5’9” and it hits above my ankle bones. It’s perfect for my hobbit costume, however I think I’ll also be wearing it for other occasions. It’s soft, lightweight and 100% cotton. The waistband is comfy and stretchy but snug. No pockets. Sheerness is as expected for linen, but since there’s two layers, sheerness will not be an issue.

This skirt is nice and full however was completely see through. The inner skirt is shorter than the outer, if they were both the same length it would be better. Also I am A size 14 L/XL and the Large wouldn’t fit over my hips.

I’ll admit, I wasn’t expecting much but wow! When these arrived today, I immediately tried them on and I love these skirts. I ordered 4 of them: gray (which is actually like a faded denim blue), light green, black, and off-white (which is beige). I love them all! 5’5” 140lbs usually a sz 6-8. Size M was PERFECT—waist and length. I’m trying to resist buying more colors. These skirts are SO light, airy, and comfortable: Bought them specifically  for a trip to Morocco and can’t wait to wear them.

I don’t have much time to write reviews, so I’ll be brief. You get what you pay for:  • The color is quite different from the photo  • After 5 or 6 times of gentle wear at home, this skirt has a hole in the seam, like, out of nowhere.  I am not trying to say “don’t buy it” — buy it, if you wish, but be aware that you get what you pay for.
This stunk sooooooo bad and the bag which it came in was soo small you could only fit it back in if you fold/roll it the way it originally came

Looking at this skirt, I assumed it would be very light and airy, but it was probably the warmest part of my outfit. The color is super pretty, and works really well with any other shade of purple! It is very layered so it is pretty to look at, but very warm. I would recommend that if you want to wear it in the summer to have some sort of skirt holsters on it so it isn’t too hot. Other than that, this product is great!
I wasn’t, but it was such poor quality and fit. I donated it.
A terrific skirt. Covers my leg brace, flows very nicely, cool in the heat, not see-through, too, very light layers, received compliments.
This skirt is the best skirt I’ve ever purchased. It is so flattering and the double layered fabric is still light and flowy!  Can’t recommend highly enough!
I purchased the mint green and I loved it so much that I got the pink one! I am planning to get more!
The denim color is 100% polyester; item description states 100% cotton

I bought one of these skirts awhile ago and have loved it.  The skirt wa 100% cotton.  This skirt was listed on Amazon also as 100% cotton.  The skirt delivered is 100% polyester.  I have skin issues with polyester that I am hoping will not show with skirt.

评论概述: This came and I AM so pleased
评论详情: I Love my beautiful green skirt! Thank You
I got my usual size, and couldn't even get it half way up my legs! This runs SO small! Order two sizes bigger than you expect!

I wanted to love this skirt. I DO love this skirt - but I’ve only worn it thrice and it’s starting to fall apart. It’s not an issue with the seams; the fabric itself is beginning to tear away from the stitching because it’s so thin. While the sheerness makes it great for floofy, fun layers, any repairs will just damage the fabric more.  It’s true to size, adorable, and the color is perfect, but if you need something to hold up to normal wear and tear this is not the skirt for you.

评论概述: The Cream Skirt was a DREAM! Why isn’t the black?
评论详情: I adored this skirt in another color so I immediately got it in black, too. Welllll it’s a size smaller. Not by their label—just in how it fits. How disappointing! I’m tall (5’9”) and wear size 12 (M in Old Navy bottoms).  I don’t know why I keep buying anything that isn’t Grace Karen online. Every once in a while I’ll get something good but this is a DRY CLEANING ONLY skirt.  …which means it really shouldn’t be in the washer even on delicate like the other reviews said. Definitely don’t put it in the dryer.  It’s cotton. 100%  The black had a chemical smell, though. Off white didn’t.  Super disappointed. I pretty much only wear black so the first order was me being daring.  Not for plus size/curvy or short people. Unfortunate.

评论概述: Beautiful skirt but too long for women of short stature
评论详情: I love the light, breezy, texture and flow of the skirt. However, it's too long. I needed a large at ankle length for women who are stature challenged, and have a little more meat on their bones. A larger size does not always denote longer length. I'm 5'2 165 lbs. The skirt literally drags the floor. To get the skirt hemmed would cost more than the actual skirt so I'm going to return it, order a medium, and pray that it hits in all the right places.

I got this skirt to dye after reading reviews. I used both Rit and Procion MX and the skirt will barely accept the dye and the two layers dyed differently. As seen in the photo, the inner layer and waistband accepted some dye but the outer layer did not (color difference more dramatic in person) This leads me to believe it is not actually cotton.
The fabric is ok, and it looks ok, but it came smelling horrible, had to wash it twice before being able to use it

评论概述: Cute skirt but it's little girl sizes
评论详情: I ordered a medium, I am 5'6 and 135 lb, athletic, and medium fits me in almost everything. However, this skirt, while beautiful, was so tight around the waist it fit like a small or extra small and I had to return it. Even if I tried to wear it higher up on my waist, it was so tight. So I would definitely try sizing up because it's a beautiful skirt but I didn't want to risk the large being too small.

评论概述: Wonderful for ladies in this warm weather
评论详情: As I get a little older I am finding it difficult to find age appropriate clothing that is still cool both in look and temp. This skirts does both either every day with a t shirt. Or dressing up with a cotton floral top and a belt .

评论概述: Cute skirt for casual or dressy events
评论详情: Got the navy skirt and it’s super cute. Can see it paired with a simple tank top or something a little nice for going out. Probably want to pair with a belt to hide the elastic waist. It’s a keeper!

The waistband size is not consistent. I ordered the medium in white and it was perfect. I ordered it black same size. The waist was too small. I returned it. I ordered a large in black, and the waste was still too small. I. Also returned this item and will not order again.

评论概述: Toxic smell on black skirt will not wash out. Noxious fumes made me sick
评论详情: I hit this Ian brown tan and it was lovely. I bought a black one and the fumes were so strong they made me ill and my skin rash. I washed it 3 times and still the fumes remain. This is a highly toxic dye or some other substance in this item.
I loved the shirt however, it’s kinda see through and would not fit my waist properly. Definitely not one size fits all.

评论用户: Fit true to size and are great quality!
评论概述: The liner fits weird and is made of the same see through fabric
评论详情: I love the look and airy ness of the skirt, the size was true to size. It’s right on my ankles as a 5’9” person. My only issue is the liner always feels like it is twisted and it’s simply another layer of the material so I am always paranoid it is see through when the light is on it. I traveled across the world with it and it wrinkled less than expected.

I have this in three colors now- black, rust red, and off white. Pictured is the off white, which is nice sandy/light khaki color. Ordered my normal size, fit is perfect.  These are very nice, light weight skirts. Elastic waist band fits well, stays up but isn't tight. I typically wear it at my hips as pictured, but have also worn them at my waist line and both are comfortable. They are thin, but do have shorter under layer and I've never had any issues with panty lines/show through/etc. Length is perfect, which is a major plus for me because I'm used to everything being too long.  For reference, I am 5'1'', around 110-115 pounds. Ordered small.

Depending on the designer, I can wear a M or L in skirts, shorts, and pants. I'm 5'8" and 143 lbs. This skirt was a little snug in the waist. I am returning for a size L. I have long legs, and this skirt comes right to my ankle. -Waistband does not have enough give -Beautiful layers of fabric -Not see through! Yeah!
Good material, good underskirt
Style, material and feel are exactly what I wanted. It’s unusual to have that happen.
I absolutely love my skirts. I am 5’7 and the longer length was perfect. The waist is a tad bit smaller than normal but ok! I would definitely purchase additional colors.
Bought this for my daughter for a play she was in.  She is typically not a skirt person but she loved how comfortable this was & that you could twirl in it.

评论概述: Light weight and pretty for summer
评论详情: I got this skirt for my sister for her Birthday and she loves it! It is pretty and lightweight.
Full, long, and nice color exactly as advertised
Great skirt. Surprised with the quality. Bought a medium and I’m about 29” waist 133lbs
I was skeptical regarding sheerness, but it is fine.  The slip part is indeed short, but it is long enough to cover all that is necessary.  Skirt comes down to my ankles, and I am 5'6".

评论概述: One says 100% cotton/ Other Says 100% polyester… same price
评论详情: I love everything about this skirt, unfortunately, for me, I don’t like to wear plastic … I love the green one so much that I bought the navy blue but when I check the tags of the navy one, I noticed that it said 100% polyester even though the Amazon listing says it is 100% cotton. Now I am second-guessing, whether the first one is actually 100% cotton because they look and feel exactly the same, also from the same company… I might just return both.

评论概述: Beautiful and light; bit tight in the waist
评论详情: Size Large. I have been searching for skirts that a first and foremost comfortable, then flattering, then light for cool wearing in the hot months. This skirt checks all of those boxes. At 5'2" 180 lbs the waist is a tiny bit tight and needs to sit up closer to my bust for it to fall just below my ankles. I may try to hem it. I tried the XL and it is overall more comfortable however even longer....

Very soft and flows skirt. Super light weight and perfect for summer. Took some heavy steaming to get some wrinkles out, but i would need an iron to dispel all of them. No pockets, unfortunately, but still a really nice summer skirt. Will probably get a few colors
But the black dye got all over everything 😒

This skirt has the most terrible chemically, musty, smell I have ever had the displeasure of smelling. As soon as I opened the box I was hit with it. The tag says do not machine wash and dry clean is preferred, but it smelled so horrible I had to wash it. I hand washed in cold water with unscented soap. As soon as it hit the water, it began bleeding dye and the water turned almost black. It is now line drying and hopefully will be ready for my event. If I had not needed it so soon, I would’ve returned it. It seems like it’s decent in terms of fabric and the fullness of the skirt, but I wouldn’t purchase simply because of the smell.
Thin cheap fabric.
Arrived quickly and as the advertisement stated.
Favorite skirt I’ve ever owned! Delightful to wear. Light and flowy, perfect length and fit, beautiful color. For reference, I bought light green in small and am 5’4” with a 28.5” waist
The skirt is so light and comfortable. It looks absolutely beautiful! The color was perfect too

评论概述: I wish I could give it 5 stars
评论详情: I had high hopes and was initially extremely happy with this skirt. I bought this for a Rapunzel renfaire outfit. The color and style work perfectly. Love that it's 100% cotton, and its super soft. HOWEVER, it is soooo thin and the fabric unfortunately snags SO easy. These snags happened after washing it. So be very mindful what you wash this with and maybe air dry.
The fabric is nice, it's stretchy and feels super comfy while on. I got it to wear to a ren faire I was working and it was great. Not sheer, it's flowy, and super lightweight.

The fabric is thin, but it's light and airy.  Perfect for summer.  It has a liner, but it's very short and seems kind of useless.I'm 5'8" and 200lbs.  I'm pear shape and the skirt wouldn't fit over my hips.  I out it on over my head and it fit nicely on my waist.Hopefully it doesn't shrink in the wash.  I'm looking forward to wearing it.

I love this skirt, it looks exactly as pictured. But it's A LOT OF FABRIC. I am 5'3". I need to roll up the waist a couple of times which isn't flattering because the waist is a bit loose. I should have returned but i was traveling during the return window
Such a cute fit- extremely comfortable and quick delivery!!
Super cute skirt, light material, size exactly as advertised, cheaply made in china.
Very nice full circle skirt, very soft with attached slip. Runs a little small. Washed well. Ankle length for me (5'7") which was perfect.

评论用户: This is rayon, not cotton!!! Cute top but the description is wrong
评论详情: I bought this skirt looking for something petticoat-like so I wouldn’t have to make one, and it perfect. The fabric is actually cotton and so soft, double layered against sheerness, and just puffy enough to make my lightweight over skirt flow. 100% would recommend

I bought this for the Renaissance festival. I love the material. It is very light and flowing. Perfect for a hot day. It is just so long. I am 5’4 and would have to take off 10 inches to make it floor length. If you are 6 feet tall it will fit perfect. It is beautiful.
OMG, best summer skirt ever!!! So far I have purchased 2- wearing them makes me feel like a princess, as corny as that sounds!
love the quality of the material and the length of the skirt.
I love the fit of the skirt. It's a fun skirt to wear. The description matched what I received as far as the size, color and the delivery of the product.
I haven't worn it yet but tried it on. It fits great and will be used as part of a pirate costume for a cruise.
My daughter wanted a maxi skirt, that went down to the floor.  This skirt came up higher than expected, especially compared to the images.  It's still beautiful and she loves it.
Not only was it in poor quality and short it also had stain all over it!
I like the elastic waste & it's a good length
Runs big. I ordered a small and it’s looser around the waist than I would like. Wish I could size down but, alas, there is no XS option. Other than that, beautiful, well-made skirt.

This skirt flows, and is a great addition to any summer wardrobe. It is long on my 5’4” frame, and the hem can be longer in spots. The uneven hem is why I rated four stars.  Would I purchase again ? Absolutely ! Four more to be exact.
